abstract: The British soul singer says internal bleeding near her vocal chords has forced her to take an extended rest.
snippet: The British soul singer says internal bleeding near her vocal chords has forced her to take an extended rest.
lead_paragraph: For the second time this year, Adele has been forced to cancel a sold-out tour of several American cities because of health problems affecting her voice.

headline.main: For 2nd Time, Adele Cancels a Tour
